verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [or] Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is fixed לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> my heart אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God אָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> and give praise אַף־ <S%H637><s%> even כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H3519><s%> even with my glory
ע֭וּרָֽה <S%H5782><s%> Awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <S%H5782><s%> I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> among the people יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ <S%H2167><s%> and I will sing praises בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> among אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to שְׁחָקִ֥ים <S%H7834><s%> [reacheth] unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Be thou exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> and thy glory

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <S%H2502><s%> may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <S%H3039><s%> That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <S%H3467><s%> save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> [with] thy right hand וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> and answer

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> in his holiness אֶעְלֹ֥זָה <S%H5937><s%> I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <S%H2505><s%> I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <S%H4058><s%> and mete out

לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד ׀ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לִ֤י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> [is] mine Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah מְחֹקְקִֽי׃ <S%H2710><s%> [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב ׀ <S%H4124><s%> Moab סִ֬יר <S%H5518><s%> caldron רַחְצִ֗י <S%H7366><s%> is My washbowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Over אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <S%H5275><s%> my shoe עֲלֵֽי־ <S%H5921><s%> Over פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> over Philistia אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃ <S%H7321><s%> will I triumph

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <S%H2986><s%> Who will bring עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> Ai מִבְצָ֑ר <S%H4013><s%> me into the strong מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who נָחַ֣נִי <S%H5148><s%> will lead עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> O אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> [Wilt] not [thou] O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H2186><s%> [who] hast cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> go forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ? and wilt not thou O God בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> our armies

הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> Give לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת <S%H5833><s%> us help מִצָּ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <S%H7723><s%> for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H8668><s%> [is] the help אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> we shall do חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6862><s%> our enemies
